title: Ramachandra College of Engineering: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Ramachandra College of Engineering Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Ramachandra College of Engineering Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Ramachandra College of Engineering Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: RCE Eluru Admissions 2024
description: Candidates who have passed intermediate with maths, physics and chemistry and valid EAMCET score are eligible to get admission in an undergraduate program. While candidates with any degree with a valid ticket score can be eligible to get into postgraduate admission.

basic_info.name: RCE Eluru Placements
description: The University Placements are offered to all the candidates through its dedicated Placement Portal which has been specially designed to meet up the requirements of the recruiters and the students. The college is continuously working to bring the best placement opportunities for the students. The college offers a range of Seminars, Guest Lectures, Webinars, Conferences, Corporate Meets, Personality Development & Communication Skills Programs and Counselling Sessions to make the candidates ready for the placements.

basic_info.name: RCE Eluru Facilities
description: It is one of the fastest-growing colleges in India and strives for excellence in all domains to provide quality education and world-class facilities to the students. The university provides the students with the best class in campus life in terms of academics, accommodation and lifestyle.

basic_info.name: RCE Eluru Faculty
description: The faculty of RCE is holding doctoral degrees and lots of experience in their relevant fields. The members have published several research works, won awards, hold certifications and recognitions in various projects. The principal of the college Dola Sanjay. S, himself has around 16 years of experience across industry and academia. Here are the details of some core faculty members of the college:

faqs.question: Ques. Does RCE provide placement training?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes,the placement cell is there to provide guidance during the job searching process as well as offer internships to give exposure to the students during the real-time job process.

faqs.question: Ques. What all documents are required at the time of admission at RCE?
faqs.answer: Ans.The documents required are:Marksheets of degree / Intermediate (10 +2)10th or Equivalent CertificateIncome certificate issued by MROCaste Certificate issued by the MRO/ Competent Authority (if applicable)Aadhaar CardRation Card

faqs.question: Ques. Is there any scholarship facility provided by RCE?
faqs.answer: Ans.There are no scholarships particularly by the college but the government will provide scholarships according to their norms.

faqs.question: Ques. What will happen if I could not submit my documents at admission time?
faqs.answer: Ans.If you couldn’t submit some of your Documents which are mandatory at the time of admission, you can submit it within a week. If the certificates and results are awaited and not yet declared, then they can submit an undertaking that their Documents will be submitted within one week after their results get published.

faqs.question: Ques. Is there any transport facility from the airport, railway station and bus stand to reach RCE?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, there is a transport facility from the airport, railway station and bus stand to the university. From Vizag airport, you can reach Eluru by cabs and buses.

Section.name: About RCE
Section.description:
Ramachandra College of Engineering was established by the Founders of RATNAM EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS in Eluru, Andhra Pradesh, in the year 2008 under the leadership of Sri.G.S.Ramachandra Rao. It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and affiliated to JNTU Kakinada. The main objective of RCE is to develop highly skilled technical professionals with good knowledge, excellent communication skills and good behavior. It offers undergraduate courses as well as postgraduate courses with various specializations. Admissions are considered on the basis of merit scores in the entrance exam.
The Institute has also signed MOUs with Various Multinational companies like TATA ,Reliance HR solutions etc. which helps the students to visit the Industries and get practical experience. Every department in the institute has Technology forums & hobby clubs for students for knowledge transfer. The college provides excellent facilities with standards for all kinds of indoor & outdoor games & sports with trainers are made available for the students.

Ques. Does RCE provide placement training?
Ans. Yes,the placement cell is there to provide guidance during the job searching process as well as offer internships to give exposure to the students during the real-time job process.
Ques. What all documents are required at the time of admission at RCE?
Ans. The documents required are:
Ques. Is there any scholarship facility provided by RCE?
Ans. There are no scholarships particularly by the college but the government will provide scholarships according to their norms.
Ques. What will happen if I could not submit my documents at admission time?
Ans. If you couldn’t submit some of your Documents which are mandatory at the time of admission, you can submit it within a week. If the certificates and results are awaited and not yet declared, then they can submit an undertaking that their Documents will be submitted within one week after their results get published.
Ques. Is there any transport facility from the airport, railway station and bus stand to reach RCE?
Ans. Yes, there is a transport facility from the airport, railway station and bus stand to the university. From Vizag airport, you can reach Eluru by cabs and buses.
